description: Experienced full-stack developer with 5 years in React and Node.js.
Strong organizational skills and HR background.
Skilled in agile project management, cross-functional coordination, and product strategy.
Creative designer with experience in Figma, Adobe XD, and user-centered design.
Expert in SQL, Python, and data visualization with 4 years of analytics experience.
Specializes in digital marketing, social media campaigns, and brand growth strategies.
Experienced in AWS, CI/CD pipelines, and server automation.
Excellent communication skills and experience managing client inquiries and tickets.
Strong analytical skills, business process improvement, and reporting experience.
Specializes in automated and manual testing, with a focus on high-quality software delivery.
